title: cloud adaptions
extract: We define the dimensions of cloud systems adaptation as: 1) Adapted cloud resource, which categorises what resources are modified and how; 2) Adaptation objective is a desired business outcome; 3) Adaptation techniques are a set of analytical and modelling techniques used to achieve the adaptation objective; 4) ...May 24, 2016
